title: Bianchi Impulso Pro carbon gravel bike crosses the gap between road and off-road
content:
Bianchi’s new carbon Impulso Pro gravel bike updates all-road, falling back between road and the recent Arcadex adventure bike, with a promise of speed and versatility for where the pavement ends. Taking the Impulso name as an evolution of their All-Road platform, the new Impulso Pro brings speed and agility from another dropbar bike we’ve […]

The post Bianchi Impulso Pro carbon gravel bike crosses the gap between road and off-road appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
